mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM club_member WHERE club_id = #{clubId} AND stop_date is null AND join_date is not null

SELECT cm.*, m.member_name as member_name, m.profile_img, (SELECT nvl(sum(price),0) FROM acc_book_history
WHERE trunc(pay_date) >= ( SELECT trunc(start_date) FROM club_success_history WHERE club_id = #{clubId} AND success_state = 'SU3' ) AND trunc(pay_date) <= ( SELECT trunc(end_date) FROM club_success_history WHERE club_id = #{clubId} AND success_state = 'SU3' )
AND member_id = m.member_id) as sum_price FROM club_member cm join member m on cm.member_id = m.member_id WHERE club_id = #{clubId} AND cm.join_date is not null AND cm.stop_date is null ORDER BY sum_price

SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM club_member WHERE join_date is not null AND stop_date is null and club_id = #{clubId}) as count, (SELECT club_people FROM club where club_id = #{clubId}) as people from club where club_id = #{clubId}
